Event Name: SANS Oil & Gas Cybersecurity Summit & Training
SANS Threat Hunting & Incident Response Summit & Training
SANS Cyber Threat Intelligence Summit & Training

Comments: For over a decade the SANS ICS Security Summit has been a leading conference on bringing together researchers, industry professionals, and government audiences. The page above links to the various SANS ICS events but look for the one that says “ICS Security Summit” each year. It is usually held in March at Disney World in Orlando Florida. Its strong suit is the educational and training aspects not only because of the classes but also because of the strong industry focus.

The S4 conference is a powerhouse of leading ICS security research. Dale puts on a fantastic conference every year (now with a European and Japanese venue as well each year) that brings together some of the most cutting edge research and ideas. S4 in the US is often held in January in Florida.

Event Name: International Society of Automation (ISA) Virtual CSIC
